title.narrative: Humanitarian Response to Haiti Earthquake Jan 2010

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative supports the Humanitarian Response to Haiti following the 7.0 magnitude earthquake that struck Haiti on 12 January 2010. The earthquake had a devastating impact of the people of Haiti with tens of thousands of casualties and millions affected. Critical infrastructure such as airports, roads, electricity, water and communications were severely affected. The funding will be used to support activities to aid emergency relief efforts including: immediate clearing and disposal of debris; water and sanitation programs - to deliver clean water and environments to affected communities; food relief programmes - delivery food supplies to affected communities; and reconstruction activities. The total value of this initiative is $6 million over 1 financial year 2009-10.
